questions.question: Which of the following is a natural fiber?
What is the primary source of silk fiber?
Which fiber is known for its warmth and moisture-wicking properties?
What is the term for the spiral arrangement of fibers in a yarn?
Which yarn count system uses weight in grams per 1000 meters?
What is the purpose of warp winding?
choices: To create organized, tensioned threads for weaving
To prepare bobbins for weft insertion
questions.answer: To create organized, tensioned threads for weaving

questions.question: Which fiber is often used in activewear due to its quick-drying properties?
What is a staple fiber?
choices: A short fiber that must be spun into yarn
A fiber used only in industrial textiles
questions.answer: A short fiber that must be spun into yarn

questions.question: Which direction does an S-twist yarn spiral?

choices: Enhanced durability and specific performance characteristics
questions.answer: Enhanced durability and specific performance characteristics

questions.question: Which fiber is commonly used in traditional Timorese tais weaving?

choices: To hold weft yarn for insertion
questions.answer: To hold weft yarn for insertion
